title: Becky
description: Rebecca Peterson is a thrifty, no frills woman. She likes her things organised and her life in order. One day on impulse she pretends to be ‘Becky’, a woman who is flirty, fresh and fun.Lucas is a workaholic, a business trip to Melbourne results in a lost account and the chance meeting of Becky.Showing him around her city she wasn’t prepared to fall in love. Leaving him with a Dear John Letter he is determined to find the woman he fell in love with.With little more than her name, can Lucas find the woman who turned his heart and world upside down? And could she put Lucas out of her mind and out of her heart?
author: Valissa Enever
